entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 09:20 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: ESE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
